channel.title: Single Combat: What did I do wrong?

item.title: Single Combat: What did I do wrong?
item.dc:creator: @RuneRemix RuneRemix
item.description:
@RuneRemix wrote:

Ok… now search for:

boolean attack()

And add in something along the lines of:

if (pl2.isFighting && singleCombat())
{
sendMessage("This player is already in combat hoe.");
return;
}

Now please realize you might not have “pl2” or “isFighting”
So you need to change those on your own.

Read full topic
item.source: Single Combat: What did I do wrong?

item.title: Single Combat: What did I do wrong?
item.dc:creator: @ZYG ZYG
item.description:
@ZYG wrote:

Trying to make castle single:

public boolean singleCombat() { if((absX >= 3042 && absX <= 3128 && absY >= 3512 && absY <=3616) || (absX >= 3324 && absX <= 3380 && absY >= 3560 && absY <=3710) || (absX >= 3003 && absX <= 3013 && absY >= 3630 && absY <=3638)) return true; else return false; }

Read full topic
